conbody.p: The appearance of the output PDF is controlled by a Miramo Format Definitions (MFD) template - the separation of form and content. Templates are created and modified using MiramoDesigner (MiramoDesigner.exe), the GUI template design tool component of MiramoPDF.
The default template (default.mfd) supplied with the plugin provides a single-column layout for rendering MiramoXML to PDF.
Here is the result of publishing the taskbook.ditamap sample located in the /samples/taskbook folder: taskbook.pdf
